body.name: Ring Doorbell Screwdriver Replacement Screwdriver for Ring Doorbell Double-ended T6 T15 Ring Screwdriver Bit For Video Doorbell, Video Doorbell 2, Pro and Elite
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Ring Doorbell Screwdriver: Made of industrial grade quality S2 steel, the ring doorbell tool is sturdy, durable, resistant to corrosion and rust. The interchangeable head is convenient to switching.

2 in 1 Ring Doorbell Screwdriver: The screwdriver for doorbell has double-ended T6 T15 torx screwdriver bit, suitable for ring doorbell screws only. T15 screwdriver bit for bigger size screws, T6 screwdriver bit for small ones.
Non-Slip Handle: This ring screwdriver replacement designed with ergonomic handle, anti-slip, easy to grip and rotation, provides a comfortable and secure hold.
Magnetized Tip: Adding a magnetized tip to the heads of ring replacement screwdriver, making it easier to hold small screws.
Ring Doorbell Tool Screwdriver: Used for ring video doorbell, ring doorbell 2, ring doorbell pro and elite. Disassembling the doorbell to replace and charge the battery, or reset the WiFi password.
body.description: Material: Industrial grade S2 steel Handle: Ergonomic design with anti-slip feature Screwdriver Head: double -end T6 and T15 Torx Head Compatibility: Ring Video Doorbell, Ring Video Doorbell 2, Pro and Elite Usage: Disassemble doorbell for battery replacement, charging, or WiFi password reset This Ring Doorbell Screwdriver is a must-have tool for anyone who owns a Ring video doorbell. Made from high-quality S2 steel, this screwdriver is built to last and can withstand tough usage. Its ergonomic handle with anti-slip design provides a comfortable and secure grip, making it easy to use. With the double head design, you can quickly switch between the T6 and T15 Torx Head screwdriver, making it convenient and versatile for various doorbell maintenance tasks such as battery replacement, charging, or WiFi password reset.

reviews.reviewText: So glad I purchased this! I lost the original. I needed this to listen out and be on the lookout for crooks and criminals. ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked like a charm (Gen 1)
reviews.reviewText: I lost my original screwdriver. Ring wanted two bucks for the screwdriver and another four or five dollars to ship it to me and it would take a week. Amazon did it for five bucks flat and had it to me next day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Who even kept their original driver set from when they installed their Ring? This driver has that new install smell and looks just like the original. This has the locking ball, so it doesn't slide out and hit you in the face, when you're bent over, trying to find that incredibly small screw. This is worth buying and keeping in a safe place!
